tasks.title: Implement Weighted Edits Support
tasks.rationale: To enhance similarity scoring by allowing certain character substitutions to count differently in edit distance calculations.

tasks.title: Add Max-Distance Cutoff Option
tasks.rationale: To improve performance by allowing the distance method to return early for inputs exceeding a specified threshold.
deliverables: New methods distance(s1, s2, max_dist=N) and similarity(s1, s2, max_dist=N)

tasks.title: Implement Multi-Threaded Batch Distance Computation
tasks.rationale: To allow faster processing of large lists of strings for similarity ranking.
deliverables: New batch method batch_distance(list1, list2, threads=T)

tasks.title: Output Edit Operations Path
tasks.rationale: To provide detailed insights into the edit operations performed during distance calculations.

tasks.title: Support Unicode Grapheme Clusters
tasks.rationale: To ensure multi-codepoint characters are treated as single units in distance calculations.
deliverables: Tests for grapheme vs code-point scenarios

tasks.title: Introduce Pure-Python Fallback Module
tasks.rationale: To maintain functionality on platforms where the C extension cannot compile.

edges.reason: Max-distance cutoff may depend on weighted edits for scoring.
Batch processing may utilize max-distance cutoff for efficiency.
Batch processing may require detailed edit operations output.
Edit operations may need to consider grapheme clusters.
Fallback module should support grapheme clusters for consistency.
